bilingual.source: Just very different. This world presents itself as physical to the unsuspecting eye of the dreamer who is fully convinced that he is awake.
bilingual.target: 这一世界将其自身作为物质形式呈现于梦者确信的眼睛，使得梦者确信自己的清醒。

bilingual.source: Meanwhile, a student at Princeton University, despite his intelligence and education, was convinced it was impossible for the authority figures in the broadcast to have lied.
bilingual.target: 同时，一位普林休斯顿大学的学生，暂且不管他的智力跟教育，他确信的是权威人士是不可能在广播中说谎的。

bilingual.source: We all be convinced of his abilities.
bilingual.target: 我们都对他的能力服气。

bilingual.source: I am not convinced by his explanation.
bilingual.target: 我对他的解释并不信服。

bilingual.source: The mass of evidence convinced the jury.
bilingual.target: 大量的证据说服了陪审团。

bilingual.source: She was wholly convinced by his argument.
bilingual.target: 她被他的论点完全地说服了。

bilingual.source: I am entirely convinced that we will win.
bilingual.target: 我完全地相信我们会赢。
他的会说表达让大家都信服了。
她的解释让大家都服气了。

bilingual.source: I am convinced that this is the best solution.
bilingual.target: 我确信这是最好的解决方案。

yingyinNormal.en: I thought you were convinced.
yingyinNormal.zh: 您不是答应了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Your mother convinced me to let her join me on my missions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你妈妈当时说服了我，让她加入了我的任务。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm just not convinced it's the right way forward, to go backward.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就是觉得走向未来不该用倒退的方式。

yingyinNormal.en: Secondly, that I am convinced it will add greatly to my happiness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其次，我深信结婚会大大地促进我的幸福。

yingyinNormal.en: Gally has everyone convinced that you're the reason all this has happened.
yingyinNormal.zh: 盖里说服了所有人，是这都是你的错。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, you almost had us convinced that you were gonna change your ways.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道吗，我们差点都相信你改过自新了。

yingyinNormal.en: Doris Jones, her daughter's running. The congresswoman would need to be convinced.
yingyinNormal.zh: 桃瑞丝·琼斯，她女儿要竞选。得说服那位女议员。

yingyinNormal.en: A man named Jesus convinced you to build a church in Africa. You're kind of a sucker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个叫耶稣的男人让你掏钱在非洲盖了一座教堂，你就是这么好骗。

yingyinNormal.en: The time you put on my shirt by mistake and were convinced you'd started growing again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有那次你错穿了我的T恤，还以为自己又开始长个儿了。

yingyinNormal.en: You know what? You've convinced me. Maybe tonight we should sneak in and shampoo her carpet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说的对，也许今晚我们应该偷溜进去把她的地毯洗了。

yingyinNormal.en: But we made her believe that we did. And she convinced you. Now, wouldn't you call that blindness?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我们让她以为我们做了，而她说服了你。这不叫被蒙蔽吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I was so convinced it was Moriarty, I couldn't see what was right under my nose. Expected a pearl.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一直坚信是莫里亚蒂，我没看到眼皮底下的东西，还以为会是珍珠。

yingyinNormal.en: So the car's a success? Well, I wasn't convinced it would be, but it is. You must have a go sometime.
yingyinNormal.zh: 车不错吗？我本来不太确定，但的确不错，你哪天一定得试试。

yingyinNormal.en: He insisted that we couldn't open the park. We argued. I thought I had convinced him, but I was wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他坚持不让我们开放乐园，我们吵了一架，我以为我说服了他，但我错了。

yingyinNormal.en: Those coffers were never depleted. You simply convinced yourself otherwise to support your own machinations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们的精神之库也不曾空过，你只不过说服了你自己，否则就无法继续你的阴谋诡计。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, well, someone convinced him that you wouldn't tell the truth unless you were actually wetting yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对了，有人劝他说，如果不好好吓唬吓唬你你是不会说实话的。

yingyinNormal.en: Look Rachel, I wanted to tell you, I thought I should, I did, and then Chandler and Joey convinced me not to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瑞秋，我早就想告诉你，我觉得我应该告诉你，但是钱德和乔伊叫我不要说。

yingyinNormal.en: We don't make enough fun of you already? Oh yeah, Emily convinced me to do it. You do know that Wham broke up?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们笑你笑得还不够吗？艾蜜莉说服我去穿的。你知道威猛乐队解散了吧？

yingyinNormal.en: That whole love-crazed, besotted schoolgirl routine. Impressive. Truly. You convinced the people in The Capitol.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那一副被爱冲昏头脑的小女生模样，让人刮目相看，真的，国会区居民对你深信不疑。

yingyinNormal.en: So...Says you. ...you're convinced the underlying mortgages in these bonds are solid loans. That is our opinion, yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么… 口说无凭。你确信这些债券对应的房贷是可靠的吗？根据我们公司的观点，是的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: He's not <highlight>convinced</highlight> that kids should be involved in selecting a home
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他不确信孩子应该参与选择一个家。

examination_example.sentence: The boy is <highlight>convinced</highlight> that if he reads enough, he can explore as many career paths as he likes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个男孩确信，如果他读的书足够多，他可以探索他喜欢的任何职业道路。

examination_example.sentence: If you're not <highlight>convinced</highlight> of the inherent value in taking a year off to explore interests, then consider its financial impact.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不确信花一年时间探索兴趣爱好的内在价值，那么考虑一下它的经济影响。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Van de Rijt said he's not <highlight>convinced</highlight> that losing out gives people a psychological boost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Van de Rijt说，他不相信失败能给人们带来心理上的鼓舞。

examination_example.sentence: They're <highlight>convinced</highlight> that whatever decision they make will be the wrong one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们坚信自己做出的任何决定都是错误的。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 说服, 使相信

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
